page.title: 11Light Industry at Weston
page.content: For such a rural area there is an interesting variety of both manufacturing and service industry.All but the first are independent firms. 1.P.A.Turney - Horticultural machinery dealers & service.Approx.employees 30 2.Mervin Green - Joinery 5 3.K.R.Johnson - Metal workers 5 4.MJS Body Repairs - car bodywork 4 5.Westland Landscape-Civil contract 6 6.The Clumps Nursery-Plants nursery 2 7.Touchstone Electronics - Monitors 4 Beside this formal industry the only other general employment is on the surrounding farms, and on the RAF Airfield which dominates the area.
